@PanderingPussy @bensimmoneau @WCVB The numbers have always correlated really well with the wastewater data, which is the most unbiased info we have.

@bensimmoneau @WCVB Haven’t mentioned this in a while but the numbers were never accurate because the sources, collection & categorization were not consistent or monitored. It’s nice that you’ve had a job over the past 2 years but you never once considered non-govt inputs, so you’re still a problem
@bensimmoneau Waste water had been going down reliably….Southern 7 day average starting to tick up slightly https://t.co/jsU5hxie1T
@bensimmoneau We shouldn't be relying on any of the confusing guidance from the CDC. Walensky has proven to be incompetent.
